Interface SynapseEndpoint

A fully-resolved set of service URLs for a single network + region combination.

interface SynapseEndpoint {
    grpc: string;
    grpc_native: string;
    network: SynapseNetwork;
    region: SynapseRegion;
    rpc: string;
    wss: string;
}
